channel.title: 562 help
channel.description:
Hi, I've been getting bored lately with 317 delta (I know right) and its the only thing I know how to code. Aanndd I think im preetttyyy good at it. :P
I decided to join the 562 community.
I need help with a couple things like...
When you log in, where do you go to change that.
In the server I am using there is no ::(command) you have to click [b]`[/b] than type the command in there without the :: If it is easy, how do I turn it back to :: ? (If it takes some brain Ill do it after I know what Im doing) :P
Thanks to anyone that can help me

item.title: 562 help
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Hi,
I’ve been getting bored lately with 317 delta (I know right) and its the only thing I know how to code. Aanndd I think im preetttyyy good at it.

I decided to join the 562 community.

I need help with a couple things like…

When you log in, where do you go to change that.

In the server I am using there is no ::(command)
you have to click ` than type the command in there without the ::
If it is easy, how do I turn it back to :: ?
(If it takes some brain Ill do it after I know what Im doing)

Thanks to anyone that can help me
